show_intro: Good evening, tonight we cover 2 major stories from around the globe...

segments.ticker: SPACEX SUCCESSFULLY CATCHES SUPER HEAVY BOOSTER IN HISTORIC FLIGHT
headlines: Booster caught mid-air in groundbreaking moment
NASA praises SpaceX team for significant achievement
Mars mission goals move one step closer
segments.tts_script: SpaceX has achieved the impossible today, catching their Super Heavy Booster mid-flight. NASA has praised the team for this significant achievement, bringing us one step closer to our Mars mission.

segments.ticker: GLOBAL LEADERS AGREE ON CLIMATE FINANCE AT COP26
headlines: World leaders agree on climate finance at COP26 summit
Funds pledged to aid developing countries in transitioning to green energy
Agreement seen as crucial step towards global climate goals
segments.tts_script: Global leaders have agreed on a climate finance deal at the COP26 summit. Funds have been pledged to aid developing countries in transitioning to green energy, which is seen as a crucial step towards our global climate goals.
